page.title: 11Youth Activities in Weston
page.content:
There are several clubs in Weston for young people. For the very young there is the{Play Group}which meets weekly and provides toys and craft activities for some 20 children aged from birth to 5 years. For older children the{Youth Club}has recently been reformed and has 14 members aged between 8 and 15 years who meet fort- nightly for table tennis, quizzes etc.
The Girl Guide Movement is well supported in the Village. Some 18 {Brownies}and 30{Guides}meet weekly to undertake outdoor and handicraft activities. The Guides also go camping regularly. The{Ranger Guide unit meets fortnightly. Most of its 12 members are Queen's Guides and all are working on the Duke of Edinburgh's Award Scheme. The Rangers enjoy hiking camping and fundraising for charity.
